column2: "Task 3: <yellow>Perform Chain Finish with a Chain of 10 or higher"

"・Activate Chain Trigger from the Subpalette
・Hit with normal attacks to raise the Chain counter
・Use a Photon Art with <%PhotonArts> to perform a Chain Finish"
